content.html: Every time JK Terfling opens her mouth, we have to go through this again, so: You cannot support work that the author still profits from without supporting the author. Saying you don’t support her doesn’t stop your money from going into her pocket when you consume her work.
content.value:
Every time JK Terfling opens her mouth, we have to go through this again, so: You cannot support work that the author still profits from without supporting the author.

Saying you don’t support her doesn’t stop your money from going into her pocket when you consume her work.
